name: Sasha_Pancho
content:
Sasha Pancho was a Human female Jedi who was affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. She was trained in medicine and beast riding and was skilled at sneaking and hiding and speaking different languages. Pancho stood 1.6 meters tall, carried a lightsaber and two medpacs, and wore a set of robes.
Sasha Pancho was created for the Rebel Characters Adventure Set, a boxed set of metal miniatures released in 1989 by West End Games to be used with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. Pancho's character type was listed as "Female Minor Jedi" and her model came unpainted.
